name: OCKAnyContactStore
desc: A custom store that performs read/write operations on a contact data type.

items.name: func addAnyContact(OCKAnyContact, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyContact>?)
items.desc: Adds a contact asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addAnyContacts([OCKAnyContact], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyContact]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of contacts asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateAnyContact(OCKAnyContact, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyContact>?)
items.desc: Updates a contact asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateAnyContacts([OCKAnyContact], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyContact]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of contacts asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyContact(OCKAnyContact, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyContact>?)
items.desc: Deletes a contact asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyContacts([OCKAnyContact], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyContact]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of contacts asynchronously from the store.
